ValidationRule.description: Validates the company ID is equal to that on the account. GSO-125
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISBLANK(ZP_Company_ID__c) || ISBLANK(Account.ZP_Company_ID__c), false, ZP_Company_ID__c != Account.ZP_Company_ID__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The company ID does not match with the account.
